name: Davies
description:
Introduction

Approach

Park on the Kanangra Walls road at the start of the King Pin firetrail. Follow the firetrail to Mt Thurat, then walk across Thurat Tops (difficult navigation) to Thurat Ridge as far as 33058 41757. Drop water for the exit walk. Descend down to Sally Camp Creek, entering the creek at about 32837 42294 (no lower downstream).

Descent

Follow the attached quick reference.

Also useful to refer to GPS waypoints (click map top of page)

Exit

  • From campsite proceed up ridge to Mt Paralyser summit
  • After bushfire + La Ni√±a route is now heavily overgrown from approx 650m elevation to summit
  • From Mt Paralyser summit walk along ridge line back to entry route

Red tape

Beta sites
